Mountain Climber Font

During my freshman year at d.tech, I tried my hand at making a geometric font for my Prototyping class.

I made this slideshow to showcase my font for the class. (Some of the screenshots I will need to redo, since the font can sometimes have small thin lines in places.)

Currently a junior at Santa Clara University, Nicolas Gibson is passionate about all things design, constantly learning new things and putting them into practice.
